verses.name: Job 38:18
verses.text: Hast thou perceived the breadth of the earth? declare if thou knowest it all.

verses.name: Job 38:19
verses.text: Where is the way where light dwelleth? and as for darkness, where is the place thereof,

verses.name: Job 38:20
verses.text: That thou shouldest take it to the bound thereof, and that thou shouldest know the paths to the house thereof?

verses.name: Job 38:21
verses.text: Knowest thou it, because thou wast then born? or because the number of thy days is great?

verses.name: Job 38:22
verses.text: Hast thou entered into the treasures of the snow? or hast thou seen the treasures of the hail,
